hero.subtitle: Empowering your workforce with certified safety training and compliance solutions. Keep your team safe and your operations compliant.

courses.description: From basic safety awareness to advanced certifications, we offer comprehensive training programs tailored to your industry needs.

osha10.title: OSHA 10-Hour General Industry
osha10.description: Foundational safety training covering workplace hazards, PPE, and OSHA regulations for general industry workers.

osha30.title: OSHA 30-Hour Construction
osha30.description: Comprehensive safety training for construction supervisors and managers covering all major safety topics.

forklift.title: Forklift Operator Certification
forklift.description: Complete forklift training including theory, hands-on operation, and OSHA-compliant evaluation.

confined.title: Confined Space Entry
confined.description: Training on hazards of confined spaces, atmospheric testing, and rescue procedures.

fall.title: Fall Protection
fall.description: Comprehensive fall hazard awareness, equipment inspection, and proper use of fall arrest systems.

hazmat.title: Hazmat Awareness
hazmat.description: Initial training for employees who may encounter hazardous materials in the workplace.

about.description: For over two decades, LSTD has been the premier provider of industrial safety training and compliance solutions. Our mission is to create safer workplaces through education, practical training, and ongoing support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading provider of industrial safety training in the region, setting the standard for excellence and innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower organizations with the knowledge and skills needed to create safe, compliant, and productive workplaces.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 1998, LSTD has grown from a small training consultancy to a comprehensive safety solutions provider serving clients across multiple industries.

team.title: Management Team
team.content: Our leadership team brings decades of combined experience in industrial safety, training development, and organizational management.

cta.description: Get in touch with our training specialists to discuss your needs and build a customized training program for your organization.

footer.description: Professional industrial safety training and compliance solutions for businesses of all sizes.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: PPP Projects & Initiatives
projects.description: Explore our public-private partnership projects and major initiatives that have shaped industrial safety standards.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Training & Consulting Services
services.description: Comprehensive industrial safety solutions tailored to your organization's needs.

news.title: News & Media
news.subtitle: Latest Updates
news.description: Stay informed with the latest news, press releases, and media coverage from LSTD.

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join Our Team
careers.description: Build your career with LSTD and help us create safer workplaces around the world.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
